price: 102. No oirán su crepitar y vivirán eternamente disfrutando de lo que deseen.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna ḥasīsahā wahum fī mā ish'tahat anfusuhum khālidūna
